# Contract Analysis Application - Copilot Instructions

This is a JavaScript web application for analyzing contracts using Azure Content Understanding Service.

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Node.js web application with Express backend
- **Frontend**: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express
- **Azure Services**: Azure AI Document Intelligence (Content Understanding), Azure OpenAI
- **Features**: 
  - Three-pane UI (document viewer, content list, details)
  - PDF document upload and viewing
  - Content extraction (headers, paragraphs)
  - Interactive navigation
  - LLM-powered Q&A

## Architecture
- Frontend serves static files with responsive three-pane layout
- Backend handles Azure service integration
- RESTful API for document processing and LLM queries

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+)
- Follow async/await patterns
- Handle errors gracefully with user-friendly messages
- Keep Azure credentials in environment variables
- Modular code structure
